name: Aviagen EPI
membership: AVEC, ELPHA, EPB, EFFAB, EURSAFE, ATF, FABRE TP, WPSA, ATA, European Veterinary Study Group, IPC and regional and national associations and corporations
goal: Breeding (pedigree) and multiplication of meat chickens and turkeys from a large diverse population base with high health, broad based welfare and sustainability programmes.
interests: Agriculture, Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Research and innovation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: EU initiatives in the area of animal welfare, animal health, animal diversity, research and development, technology development, transport, trade.
